MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Kirkcudbright. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:18pm on Friday, 20 November 2020
